Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers are confident whether or not Shohei Ohtani plays, according to Teoscar Hern√°ndez
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers have a 2-0 lead in the World Series, their first time leading a series 2-0 since the 2020 NLDS
Historically, being up 2-0 in the World Series has proven fruitful, with 45 of the first 56 teams winning the championship
The Dodgers have an October history richer than any pair of teams in major league history, with 12 World Series matchups against the Yankees
Others: Walker Buehler will start Game 3 on Monday night in New York
The Dodgers will run a bullpen game in Game 4
Jack Flaherty is presumably available for a potential Game 5 on four days rest if his hamstring feels good
